TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed KeyRestrictionBehavior extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Identifies a list of connection string parameters identified by the `KeyRestrictions` property that are either allowed or not allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.KeyRestrictionBehavior AllowOnly = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Default. Identifies the only additional connection string parameters that are allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.KeyRestrictionBehavior PreventUsage = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Identifies additional connection string parameters that are not allowed.
